The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game

wikitext.*:
'''Fantasy Flight Games''' is a game developer who created [[The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game]],<ref>https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/products/the-lord-of-the-rings-the-card-game/</ref> [[Lord of the Rings (board game)]],<ref>https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/products/lord-of-the-rings-the-board-game/</ref> [[The Lord of the Rings: Journeys in Middle-earth]]<ref>https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/products/the-lord-of-the-rings-journeys-in-middle-earth/</ref> and [[Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation]].<ref>https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/products/lord-of-the-rings-the-confrontation/</ref> 

It's a subdivision of Asmodee (since 2014)<ref>https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/news/2014/11/17/fantasy-flight-games-to-merge-into-the-asmodee-group-tm/</ref> and in turn, of the [[Embracer Group]].<ref>https://embracer.com/about/operative-groups/asmodee-group/</ref>
